column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The food that I always ordered would be the JINYA Tonkatsu Black with no green onions and their parmesan fries with truffle ketchup. But recently
column3: and that made me really sad. Though
column4: the parmesan fries themselves are still good! Their ramen portion
column6: is enough to make a person SOO full!!! The seasoned egg is probably my favorite part of the ramen
column7: because when I split the egg in half
column8: the yolk is still melting! SO DELICIOUS!
